newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Nepal tenders to buy 0.5-pct diesel for August.
newsitem.headline: Nepal tenders to buy 0.5-pct diesel for August.

text.p: State-owned Nepal Oil Corp (NOC) has issued a tender to buy two 30,000-tonne cargoes of 0.5-percent sulphur diesel for deliveries in August, traders said on Tuesday.
The tender seeks cargoes for two delivery dates--August 11-20 and August 21-31, on a cost-and-freight (c-and-f) basis to the Indian east coast.
The tender closes on July 15 and offers will be valid until July 17.
In its last tender for June 1-10 delivery, Nepal purchased 30,000 tonnes of 0.5-percent sulphur diesel from Shell Singapore at $185.73 per tonne, on a c-and-f basis to the east coast.
